replies.msg:
有人收到email 嗎？

Thank you for registering online for the Asia Microbiota Bank program! We appreciate your interest and participation. Here is a little more about our program:
The Asia Microbiota Bank (Bio Bank) is researching human gut bacteria to understand what makes us healthy in the gut, and what can be when with someone gets sick to restore a healthy gut balance (microbiome). We are collecting stool samples from healthy individuals over a period of time to do research and bacteria analysis. These stool bacteria can be used to help sick people!

We appreciate your patience in receiving this email. We have received thousands of inquiries recently, so we are still catching up!

As a first step, please click on the survey link below:
